alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:10AM CDT until June 10 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Central Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1009 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shelburn to near Delhi to near Rayville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Waverly around 1015 AM CDT. Tendal around 1020 AM CDT. Crowville, Fitler and Bakers around 1025 AM CDT. Valley Park and Afton around 1035 AM CDT. Newlight and Somerset around 1040 AM CDT. Redwood and Newellton around 1050 AM CDT. Lake Bruin around 1055 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Gilbert, Baskin, Mayersville, Delta and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
